title: Secondary use of electronic health record data of elderly care physicians: How to enhance standardized and structured recording?

abstract: Background: Elderly care physicians (ECPs) in nursing homes record information regarding patients' health, disease and provided care in electronic health records (EHRs). However, much of this health data currently lacks structure and …
